import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Swiper from "react-id-swiper"; import "swiper/swiper-bundle.css"; const SliderOne = () => { const [swiper, setSwiper] = useState(null); const [isSwiperPaused, setSwiperPaused] = useState(false); const goNext = () => { if (swiper !== null) { swiper.slideNext(); } }; const goPrev = () => { if (swiper !== null) { swiper.slidePrev(); } }; return (
